properties.description: Performances were held mainly in washa and goulan, the popular entertainment districts of the time. A structured role system emerged, consisting of Dan (female roles), Mo (older male roles), Jing (painted-face male roles), and Za (comic or supporting roles).
properties.Record: “构肆乐人，自过七夕，便搬《目连救母》杂剧……观者增倍。”（《东京梦华录·中元节》）

properties.description: Zaju opera absorbed the refined qualities of classical poetry and elegant language. Compared to the more popular and lively performances in Bianjing (Kaifeng), Luoyang's style was known for its literary grace and cultured expression.
properties.Record: “洛中宴集，多召杂剧以娱宾，然其词稍雅，不若汴之俚俗。”（南宋·周密《癸辛杂识》补遗）
